bibl.title: The World Turned Upside Down. Utopia and Utopianism in the Fragments of Old Comedy.
bibl.note: Paper given at the Conference of the same name, University of Wales, Institute of Classics and Ancient History, and London Classical Society, September 1996. - L'évocation de l'âge d'or dans Cratinos, Cratès, Télécleidès, Eupolis et autres. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 7737.
